text: 'ila rabukum meadkm yawm alqiamat jmyeana, whdha waead allah alhq, hu aldhy yabda 'iijad alkhalq thuma yueiduh baed almwt, fywjdh hyana khyyth alawla, liajzi man saddaq allah wrswlh, waeamil al'aemal alhasanat 'ahsan aljaza' baledl. waladhin jahaduu whdanyt allah wrsalt rasulih lahum sharab min maa' shadid alhararat yashwi alwujuh wyqttie alamea', walahum eadhab mwje bsbb kufruhum wdlalhm
